entry.title: Hate is a Bottomless Cup; I will Pour and Pour
entry.summary:
Author: gleamingmermaid

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,957Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 212

Summary: Tim Drake refuses to join Ra's Al Ghul. Ra's Al Ghul's obsession with Tim Drake takes a dark turn when Ra's captures him to make him sire his heir to succeed him as the Demon's Head. Tim Drake battles his worst nightmares as he plans to free himself and destroy everything Ra's has built, once and for all. Meanwhile, his family bands together and will not leave any stone unturned until Tim is back with them safe and sound.

entry.title: [Podfic] One Step to Survival
entry.summary:
Author: PolynomialPandemic

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 14

Summary: “You can’t fight me!” Tim said before he could stop himself. Actually, this wasn’t a bad idea. Call it cowardly, but it was better than maybe dying, no matter how Hood treated kids in his territory. "Oh, yeah? Why not, Replacement? Aren’t you meant to be a target?” Hood just shoved his forearm against him harder. Tim wheezed, but he managed to talk. This was it. This had better work. “I’m on my period!"   Tim has quickly realized that this fight is not going in his favor. Luckily, he has one more trick up his sleeve.Podfic of One Step to Survival by timbitsandpieces.

entry.title: B'traxia's Hive King Mating Guide for the Recently Transformed!
entry.summary:
Author: Tinerian

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,843Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 192

Summary: The book's cover features a lavish illustration of an alien with a roughly 'centaur' configuration of limbs. It's got a set of massive spikes for front legs that look great for digging and cleaving people in two, and a pair of cat like, pawed digidigrades for back legs. The spine and joints are armor plated, while the soft belly is lined with octopus arms of wildly varying sizes. The alien is also proudly presenting his three MASSIVE PHALLUSES for the audience. Tim sputters and laughs, opening the book up and flipping through it lazily. The quality is ridiculously good overall. It's hand bound, full color, lavishly illustrated with diagrams and charts and cultural notes and- it's honestly hilariously Jason in nature now that he thinks about it. Like, of course, Jason with his snobby love of all things hand crafted would masturbate to niche fetish shit in a weird format full of way too much worldbuilding. It's probably bespoke too; Tim would lay good money that Jason commissioned the artist himself. Tim flips back to the first page and starts reading.
